Package ModuleTransaction.Orgcom

Interface Organization

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicOrganization
public interface Organization
The Organization interface provides the methods for an organization.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean addTransaction​(Transaction transaction)
    Adds a new transaction to the ledger.
    Block getBlock​(int index)
    Return the nlock with the given index in the ledger.
    int getBlockCount()
    Returns the number of block in the ledger.
    Block getLastBlock()
    Return the last block in the ledger.

    Returns the transaction in the transaction list with the same hash as the given transaction.

    Verifies if the ledger was not tampered.
    java.util.Iterator<Block> ledgerIterator()
    Returns the iterator of the ledger.

    Prints the ledger.

    Removes the transaction from the ledger.

    Returns the iterator of the transaction in the ledger.

  • Method Details

    • addTransaction

      boolean addTransaction​(Transaction transaction)
      Adds a new transaction to the ledger.
      Parameters:
      transaction - the transaction to add.
      Returns:
      true if the transaction was added to the ledger, false if already in the ledger.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the transaction is null.

    • removeTransaction

      boolean removeTransaction​(Transaction transaction)
      Removes the transaction from the ledger.
      Parameters:
      transaction - the transaction to remove.
      Returns:
      true if the transaction was removed from the ledger, false if not in the ledger.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the transaction is null.

    • getTransaction

      Transaction getTransaction​(Transaction transaction)
      Returns the transaction in the transaction list with the same hash as the given transaction.
      Parameters:
      transaction - transaction wish hash must be equal.
      Returns:
      the transaction with the same given hash,null if not found.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the transaction is null.

    • getBlock

      Block getBlock​(int index)
      Return the nlock with the given index in the ledger.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the nlock to return.
      Returns:
      the nlock with the given index in the ledger.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is invalid.

    • getBlockCount

      int getBlockCount()
      Returns the number of block in the ledger.
      Returns:
      the number of block in the ledger.

    • getLastBlock

      Block getLastBlock()
      Return the last block in the ledger.
      Returns:
      the last block in the ledger.

    • registerTransactionsInLedger

      int registerTransactionsInLedger()
      Add all possible transaction to the ledger. The sender needs to have a token token to send a transaction. If the sender does not have a token, the transaction is not added to a block to be added the ledger. All payable transaction are added to a block. The sender pay a token for each transaction. If any transaction is added to the block, the block is added to the ledger.
      Returns:
      the number of transaction added to the new block.

    • isValidLedger

      boolean isValidLedger()
      Verifies if the ledger was not tampered. Verifies if the blocks are block and if the blocks previous hash on the ledger are consistent.
      Returns:
      true if the ledger is valid, false otherwise.

    • ledgerIterator

      java.util.Iterator<Block> ledgerIterator()
      Returns the iterator of the ledger.
      Returns:
      the iterator of the ledger.

    • printLedger

      void printLedger()
      Prints the ledger.

    • transactionIterator

      java.util.Iterator<Transaction> transactionIterator()
      Returns the iterator of the transaction in the ledger.
      Returns:
      the iterator of the transaction in the ledger.
